desc: Prevents further spreading of rising damp. Easy installation – no need to strip and repaint your wall. Simple to install with little disturbance to building structure.

layout.text: Do You Have Problems with Peeling Plaster & Paint on Your Walls?

There is no use to damp-proof and re-paint when there's still damp trapped inside a wall.

Introducing Damp-Vent - A simple & cheap ventilation solution to accelerate the drying out of walls - and cause no further damage.
